name: jjghali.github.io
description: [![Netlify Status](https://api.netlify.com/api/v1/badges/73e106a8-871a-4afe-bfeb-b2943c6a3e31/deploy-status)](https://app.netlify.com/sites/portofolio-jjghali/deploys) ## Install and run ``` echo '# Install Ruby Gems to ~/gems' >> ~/.zshrc echo 'export GEM_HOME="$HOME/gems"' >> ~/.zshrc echo 'export PATH="$HOME/gems/bin:$PATH"' >> ~/.zshrc source ~/.zshrc

scripts.build: ELEVENTY_PRODUCTION=true npx eleventy && NODE_ENV=production postcss styles/tailwind.css --o _site/style.css && cleancss _site/style.css -o _site/style.css
